annotool.gui
Class ROIAnnotator

java.lang.Object
  annotool.gui.ROIAnnotator

public class ROIAnnotator
extends java.lang.Object

ROI annotator executes the algorithms in ROI annotation mode. TODO: Rewrite to use similar technique (DataInput constructor) as in ROI input mode

                    boolean isMaximaOnly,
                    ImageReadyPanel pnlImages)
Parameters:
size - : ROI Window Size
interval - : Increment for sliding ROI window over the target image
paddingMode - : Determines the mode used to pad the image for annotation near the image edges. Modes - ROIParameterPanel.NONE, ROIParameterPanel.SYMMETRIC
channel - : Channel information of the image
selectedImages: - List of indices for images selected for annotations
